VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Potatoes?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Potatoes is arc {Corn}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Corn?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Corn is arc {Potatoes}.

Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Soybeans to Potatoes in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Barley to Rice in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Potatoes to Soybeans in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Soybeans and Corn in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Soybeans and Corn is {67}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Soybeans and Potatoes in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Soybeans and Potatoes is {114}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Corn?
SC.A: The total flow output from Corn is {148}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Barley?
SC.A: The total flow input by Barley is {502}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 283? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {708} from {Barley} to {Soybeans}, a flow of {341} from {Soybeans} to {Barley}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 74? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {70} from {Rice} to {Barley}, a flow of {67} from {Soybeans} to {Corn}, a flow of {57} from {Corn} to {Soybeans}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 95 and 107? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {100} from {Barley} to {Corn}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Soybeans to Corn or from Corn to Soybeans?
NC.A: The flow from {Soybeans} to {Corn} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Soybeans to Barley, from Corn to Barley, or from Barley to Rice?
NC.A: The flow from {Soybeans} to {Barley} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Barley}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Barley} and {Soybeans}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Soybeans, Arc Barley, Arc Rice, Arc Corn, Arc Potatoes}.
